metadata.title: CVE-2022-26280 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Libarchive v3.6.0 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via the component zipx_lzma_alone_init.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-26280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.2
libarchive13 - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.3-2ubuntu0.2').
